The parents of an individual with an autosomal recessive condition each carry one copy of the mutated gene, but they typically do not show signs and symptoms of the condition.",GHR,Manitoba oculotrichoanal syndrome
What are the treatments for Manitoba oculotrichoanal syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Manitoba oculotrichoanal syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Mani
